title: Oh Oh Nadhigal Oda Lyrics Vallavanukku Pullum Aayudham Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Oh Oh Nadhigal Oda
Singer(s): Naresh Iyer, Shreya Ghoshal
Movie: Vallavanukku Pullum Aayudham
Music: Siddharth Vipin
Lyricist: Na MuthuKumar

Railaada iddhayam aada
rathiriyil indhayam aada.
maram yaavum pinaal oda
nenjil indha payanam neelum.

Kaal aada kolusum aada
kadhoram kammal aada.
Kannoram indha kanavugal oda
nenjil indha payanam vazhum.

Edhire pogum megamaey
yaar unnai panjil seidhadhu.
Kan simittum vinmeeney adadaaa
neeyum thooramey yaar unnai
vinnil vaithaadhu.
nilavai pidikkudhey.

Oh Oh sedigal oda
oh oh kodigal oda
oh oh malargal oda
manadhum oda oo..oh...

Oh Oh Nadhigal Oda
oh oh malaigal oda
oh oh iravum oda
ulagamum oda ohhh....

Vazhakai enbadhu thodarum payanamthaan
palagum nimidam thaan.
Nam kavalai yaavum vazhiyil maarum.

Indha padhaithaan innum neelaadhaa.
inbam thodaraadhaa.
aanaalaum kaalam kailai saattum.

Vaanavil ponaalum vannangal
nam vizhigalil ennalum vazhaaladhaa..
oru naalil iththanai inbangal ennodu
idhu podhum podhumey eppodhum.

Oh Oh sedigal oda
oh oh kodigal oda
oh oh malargal oda
manadhum oda oo..oh...

Oh Oh Nadhigal Oda
oh oh malaigal oda
oh oh iravum oda
ulagamum oda ohhh....

Idha tharunanthai viumbum idhayamthaan
kattril parandhaen naan.
Unnaale iravil meley ponen.

Endrum thanimayil vazhndhu vandhen naan
enna kandaen naan.
unnaale meendum malalai aanen.

Oru naalil eththanai nyabagam nenjodu
idhu podhum podhumey eppodhum.

Oh Oh sedigal oda
oh oh kodigal oda
oh oh malargal oda
manadhum oda oo..oh...

Oh Oh Nadhigal Oda
oh oh malaigal oda
oh oh iravum oda
ulagamum oda ohhh....
